name: Husserl-1
description:
In a remote settlement of only 1,000 people on an icy planet where nothing can grow, two Cosmiczon Ltd. employees complete the last delivery on their list. They might soon come to understand that the real reason they are there might endanger their lives.

This is a preliminary version of the game. The script and text is 100% complete, but unfortunately we have only had time to finalize 75-85% of the art. Some of the screens will appear blank with text only, and others have placeholders. All that will be fixed in future versions.
